description.paragraph1: The website is a digital showcase of my professional journey as a developer, designed to showcase skills, projects, and collaborations. The focus is on minimalist design and intuitive functionality, providing a clear overview of my competencies.

developmentPhases.heading: Development Phases

phases.description: Preliminary research: Analysis of templates and standards to define functions and design.
Technical development: Using React for a scalable front-end, page management with react-router-dom, and dynamic theme change via Context API.
Code example to highlight syntax: Code for implementing syntax in React.

developmentPhases.phases2: Visual design: Dark green color palette for dark mode, light gray and green for light mode, Poppins and Inter typography.

mainDifficulties.heading: Main Difficulties
mainDifficulties.description: The choice of colors required several attempts to achieve the right balance.

resultsAndConclusions.heading: Results and Conclusions
resultsAndConclusions.description: A minimalist and functional design that reflects my professional skills and provides an intuitive user experience.
